DocAttribute.Name: CoordList
DocAttribute.Documentation: Two-dimensional list of Cartesian points provided by two coordinates.

DocAttribute.Name: TagList
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of tags corresponding to each point that may be used to identify a basis curve according to the Tag attribute at _IfcOffsetCurveByDistances_. Also used to identify _IfcSectionedSolidHorizontal_ or _IfcSectionedSurface_ shape string lines ("guide curves") when used within an _IfcProfileDef_ curve of type _IfcIndexedPolyCurve_.
